DOC.brief_title: A Four Week , Open-Label Study Azithromycin Ophthalmic Solution , 1 % ( P08641 )
DOC.criteria: Have current diagnosis posterior blepharoconjunctivitis eye ( except healthy volunteer ) Have Best Corrected Visual Acuity ( BCVA ) , use corrective lens necessary , eye least +0.7 LogMAR If female , nonpregnant nonlactating Have anterior blepharitis Have lid structural abnormality Have penetrate intraocular surgery past 90 day require penetrate intraocular surgery study Unable withhold use contact lens within 3 day prior Visit 1 study Have diagnose ongoing glaucoma Have serious medical condition could confound study assessment
